title: KiteTheReef – Guinness World Record, Kiting for a Cure (Macquarie University)
text: ( Source : Macquarie University ) Undeterred by a broken leg, and a shark bite and uncharted waters, in August 2015 , a team of 8 kite-surfers, including our very own Macquarie Motor Neurone Disease ( MND ) Researcher, Dr Nicholas Cole broke a
